languages.text: The wearer of these boots gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} while wearing a light {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

The wearer of these boots gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} while wearing a light {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

languages.text: 当装备者穿戴轻型{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}时{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}提高，加值百分比等同于{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}。
languages.original_text: The wearer of these boots gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} while wearing a light {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者穿戴轻型{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}时{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}提高，加值百分比等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。

languages.text: Сапоги дают +{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} при ношении легкой {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wearer of these boots gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} while wearing a light {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Сапоги дают +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}СИЛ{/g}</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} при ношении легкой {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}брони{/g}.
Сапоги дают +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}СИЛ{/g}</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} при ношении легкой {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}брони{/g}.

languages.text: このブーツの使用者は、ライト{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}装備時、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}+{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}%を獲得する。
languages.original_text: The wearer of these boots gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} while wearing a light {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ライト{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}を装備している時、+<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>%の{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}を獲得できる。

languages.text: El portador de estas botas gana +{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} mientras lleve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} ligera.
languages.original_text: The wearer of these boots gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} while wearing a light {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El portador de estas botas gana +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FUE{/g}</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} mientras lleve {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} ligera.

languages.text: Der Träger dieser Stiefel erhält +{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}, wenn er eine leichte {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} trägt.
languages.original_text: The wearer of these boots gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} while wearing a light {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger dieser Stiefel erhält +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STÄ{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}, wenn er eine leichte {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} trägt.
